Description:
Model
Brand: MSI
Model: MPG B650 EDGE WIFI


Supported CPU
CPU Socket Type: AM5
CPU Type: Supports AMD Ryzen 7000 Series Desktop Processor


Chipsets
Chipset: AMD B650


Memory
Number of Memory Slots: 4x288pin (DDR5)
Memory Standard: Memory Support DDR5 7800+(OC)/ 7600(OC)/ 7400(OC)/ 7200(OC)/ 7000(OC)/ 6800(OC)/ 6600(OC)/ 6400(OC)/ 6200(OC)/ 6000(OC)/ 5800(OC)/ 5600(OC)/ 5400(OC)/ 5200(OC)/ 5000(OC)/ 4800(JEDEC) MHz
Max. overclocking frequency:
- 1DPC 1R Max speed up to 7800+ MHz
- 1DPC 2R Max speed up to 6400+ MHz
- 2DPC 1R Max speed up to 6400+ MHz
- 2DPC 2R Max speed up to 5400+ MHz
Maximum Memory Supported: 192GB
Channel Supported: Dual Channel
ECC Supported: Non-ECC
Buffer Supported: Un-buffered
Memory Feature: Supports AMD EXPO


Expansion Slots
PCI Express 4.0 x16: 2x PCIe x16 slots
- Supports x16/x2
PCI_E1 slot (From CPU)
- Supports up to PCIe 4.0 x16
PCI_E2* (From B650 chipset)
- Supports up to PCIe 4.0 x2

* PCI_E2 & M2_3 share the bandwidth. PCI_E2 will run at x2 speed and M2_3 will run at x2 speed when installing devices in both slots.
PCI Express x1: 1x PCIe x1 slot
PCI_E3 slot (From B650 chipset)
- Supports up to PCIe 3.0 x1


Storage Devices
Serial ATA (SATA): 6x SATA 6Gb/s ports (From B650 chipset)
- SATA_1_2/ SATA_3_4 (From B650 chipset)
- SATA_A1_A2 (From ASM1061)
M.2: 3 x Key M (PCIe) + 1 x Key E (WiFi/BT)

3x M.2 slots (Key M)
M2_1 slot (From CPU)
- Supports up to PCIe 5.0 x4
- Supports 2280/ 22110 storage devices
M2_2 slot (From CPU)
- Supports up to PCIe 4.0 x4
- Supports 2260/ 2280 storage devices
M2_3 slot (From B650 chipset)
- Supports up to PCIe 4.0 x4*
- Supports 2260/ 2280 storage devices

* M2_3 & PCI_E2 share the bandwidth. M2_3 will run at x2 speed and PCI_E2 will run at x2 speed when installing devices in both slots.
SATA RAID: 0/1/5/10


Onboard Audio
Audio Chipset: Realtek ALC4080
Audio Channels: 7.1 Channels


Onboard LAN
LAN Chipset: 1x Realtek 8125B 2.5Gbps LAN controller
Max LAN Speed: 2.5Gbps
Wireless LAN: AMD Wi-Fi 6E RZ616
- The Wireless module is pre-installed in the M.2 (Key-E) slot
- Supports MU-MIMO TX/RX
- Supports 20MHz, 40MHz, 80Mhz, 160Mhz bandwidth in 2.4GHz/ 5GHz or 6GHz bands*
- Supports 802.11 a/ b/ g/ n/ ac/ ax

* Wi-Fi 6E 6GHz may depend on every countryâ€™s regulations and will be ready in Windows 10 21H1 and Windows 11.
Bluetooth: Supports Bluetooth 5.2*
* Bluetooth 5.2 will be ready in Windows 10 21H1 and Windows 11.


Rear Panel Ports
Back I/O Ports: 1x Flash BIOS button
1x DP port
1x HDMI port
3x USB 3.2 Gen 2 10Gbps Type-A ports (From CPU)
1x USB 3.2 Gen 2x2 20Gbps Type-C port (From B650 chipset)
4x USB 3.2 Gen 1 5Gbps Type-A ports (From B650 chipset)
2x USB 2.0 Type-A ports (From B650 chipset)
1x LAN (RJ45) jack
2x Wi-Fi Antenna connectors
5x audio jacks
1x Optical S/PDIF Out connector


Internal I/O Connectors
Onboard USB: 1x USB 3.2 Gen 2 10Gbps Type-C connector
1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 5Gbps connector
- Supports additional 2 USB 3.2 Gen 1 5Gbps ports
2x USB 2.0 connectors
- Supports additional 4 USB 2.0 ports
Other Connectors: Fan Connectors
1x 4-pin CPU fan connector
1x 4-pin water-pump fan connector
6x 4-pin System fan connectors

System Connectors
1x Front panel audio connector
2x System panel connectors
1x Chassis Intrusion connector
1x TPM module connector
1x Tuning Controller connector

Jumpers
1x Clear CMOS jumper

LED Features
1x EZ LED Control switch
2x 4-pin RGB LED connector
2x 3-pin ARGB_V2 LED connectors
4x EZ Debug LED


Physical Spec
Form Factor: ATX
LED Lighting: RGB
Dimensions (W x L): 12.0" x 9.6"
Power Pin: 1x 24-pin ATX main power connector
2x 8-pin +12V power connectors
